page.title: 04MAURICEWOOD PRIMARY,PENICUIK
page.content: Mauricewood Primary School is just outside Penicuik on the edge of Greenlaw Mains Estate. The school was opened on 6th January 1972. It is an open plan school with four blocks. Each block has four classrooms opening onto an activity area. We have a gym cum dining room, an infant hall and another gym upstairs attached to the Community Centre. The Headteacher is Mr. Ferguson. There are 16 teachers and 421 children. There are 7 classes in the infants, 5 classes in the juniors and 4 classes in the seniors. We have specialist teachers for music, P.E.. craft, and we also have a remedial teacher. we have a secretary, an auxiliary, a janitor, 5 kitchen staff, 3 lunch supervisors and 5 school cleaners. Our school is surrounded by playing fields so we can gym outside when the weather is good.
